HT_Text_FE_Menu_ConfirmQuit.message: Are you sure you want to quit?

HT_Text_FE_Menu_ConfirmQuit_XB.message: Are you sure you want to quit?\nAll unsaved progress will be lost.

HT_Text_FE_Bonus1_Description.message: Go behind the scenes of the making of Sphinx and the Cursed Mummy

HT_Text_FE_Bonus2_Description.message: Trailer for Sphinx and the Cursed Mummy

HT_Text_MemCard_PromptHaventSaved_XB.message: Are you sure you want to continue without saving?

HT_Text_ReplacePadPrompt_PS2_PAL.message: No controller inserted into controller port (MISSINGPAD). Please reinsert an analog controller (DUALSHOCK®) or analog controller (DUALSHOCK®2) to continue.

HT_Text_ReplacePadPrompt_PS2_NTSC.message: No controller inserted into controller port (MISSINGPAD). Please reinsert a DUALSHOCK® analog controller or DUALSHOCK®2 analog controller to continue.

HT_Text_ReplacePadPrompt_XB_Start.message: Please reconnect the controller to port (MISSINGPAD) and press START to continue.

HT_Text_ReplacePadPrompt_XB.message: Please reconnect the controller to port (MISSINGPAD).

HT_Text_MemCard_PromptContinueWithoutSav.message: You will be unable to save your progress or options at any point in the game. Are you sure you wish to continue?

HT_Text_ScreenAdjustText_PS2.message: Adjust the screen with\nthe directional buttons.

HT_Text_ScreenAdjustText_GC.message: Adjust the screen with the +Control Pad.

HT_Text_ScreenAdjustText_XB.message: Adjust the screen with the directional pad.

HT_Text_Memcard_SaveConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to\nsave to this slot?

HT_Text_Memcard_LoadConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to\nload this game?

HT_Text_Memcard_OverwriteConfirm.message:
Save game already exists.

Do you want to overwrite the
previous game?

HT_Text_Memcard_NoFormat.message:
Memory card (PS2) in MEMORY
CARD slot 1 is unformatted.

Format memory card (PS2)?

HT_Text_Memcard_NoFormat_Boot.message: Memory card (PS2) in MEMORY\nCARD slot 1 is unformatted.\nFormat memory card (PS2)?

HT_Text_Memcard_NoDirectory.message:
Memory card (PS2) in MEMORY
CARD slot 1 does not contain
a Sphinx folder.
Create a Sphinx folder now?

HT_Text_Memcard_NoCard.message:
Caution! Sphinx uses an Autosave feature.
Insertion of a memory card (PS2) beyond
this point may cause data to be
overwritten. However if you wish to save
your game data, insert a memory card (PS2)
with at least xKB free space.

Press START BUTTON to continue
without saves.

HT_Text_Memcard_NoCard1.message: No memory card(8MB)(for PlayStation®2)\n inserted in memory card slot 1.

HT_Text_Memcard_NoSpace_Boot.message: Insufficient space on memory card (PS2). Insert a\nmemory card (PS2) with at least xKB free space,\nor create some space using the console's internal browser.

HT_Text_Memcard_NoSpace_Save.message: Insufficient space on memory card (PS2) in MEMORY CARD\n slot 1. Sphinx requires xKB free space to save data.

HT_Text_Memcard_PressKey.message: PRESS START TO CONTINUE WITHOUT SAVES

HT_Text_Memcard_Saving.message: Saving data. Do not remove memory card (PS2) in\nMEMORY CARD slot 1, reset, or switch off the console.

HT_Text_Memcard_Formatting.message:
Formatting...


Formatting memory card (PS2) in MEMORY CARD slot 1.
Do not remove memory card (PS2),
reset, or switch off the console.

HT_Text_Menu_AdjustScreen.message: Use the left analog\nstick or directional button to\nadjust the screen position

HT_Text_Menu_NoPad.message:
The controller in controller
port 1 has been removed.
Reinsert the controller to
continue with the game.

The restored version of Sphinx would not have been possible 

without the following open-source libraries:  

  

  

SDL 2.0 - By Sam Lantinga, Ryan C. Gordon and contributors 

https://www.libsdl.org (zlib license) 

  

  

OpenAL Soft - By Chris Robinson and contributors 

http://kcat.strangesoft.net/openal.html (LGPL 2 license) 

  

  

xxHash - By Yann Collet and contributors 

https://github.com/Cyan4973/xxHash (BSD 2-Clause license) 

  

  

stb_image - By Sean Barrett and contributors 

https://github.com/nothings/stb (Public domain)

HT_Text_FE_ResolutionRequiresRestart.message: Changing the resolution requires restarting the game.

HT_Text_Gen_Help_GotBlowpipe_GyroAim.message:
You got the Blowpipe!

The magical darts fired from this powerful tool,regenerate giving you an infinite supply.

The darts can be used to hit remote targets but theyare only powerful enough to damage explosive monsters.

Use to assign the Blowpipe to a button.

Once the Blowpipe is assigned, pressthe button to enter first person mode.

Press to fire.

Keep , , or pressed while moving the left Joy-Con to aim using the gyroscopic motion controls.

Press to exitfrom Blowpipe mode.
